title: New Rice Variety Boosts Yield by 20%
description: The Bangladesh Agricultural Research Institute introduced a new rice variety that increases yield and is resistant to floods.

title: Government Launches Farmer Subsidy Program
description: The government announced a new subsidy program to support small farmers with fertilizer and seeds.

title: Organic Farming Trend Rising in Rural Areas
description: More farmers are adopting organic farming methods for better soil health and sustainable production.
